component.name: Alacritty
component.summary: A fast, cross-platform, OpenGL terminal emulator

description.p: Alacritty is a modern terminal emulator that comes with sensible defaults, but allows for extensive configuration. By integrating with other applications, rather than reimplementing their functionality, it manages to provide a flexible set of features with high performance.

screenshot.caption: Alacritty - A fast, cross-platform, OpenGL terminal emulator
